name: The International Conference on Waste Treatment and Management
content: The International Conference on Waste Treatment and Management (WTM 2024) will take place during during Oct. 31-Nov. 2 in Bali, Indonesia as a workshop of GTEE 2024.WTM 2024 merges as a pivotal platform dedicated to addressing the intricate challenges and opportunities within waste treatment and management. Throughout WTM 2024, participants will explore multifaceted themes. Through keynote sessions, panel discussions, interactive workshops, and research presentations, attendees will delve into cutting-edge innovations, best practices, and emerging strategies. All submissions will be selected through a review process. Accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published in the GTEE 2024 Conference Proceedings, which will be submitted to Scopus, CAS, DOAJ, EBSCO, ProQuest and other major databases for review and indexing. The author should submit the draft version of paper for review before the due submission deadline. Please submit the manuscript via: https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/GTEE2024 More detail about submission, please visit at: https://icwtm.org/
